attributes.action: Require cosmetic companies to state if their products are ever tested on animals
attributes.additional_details: As an animal enthusiast, animal testing is a big problem to me. Some companies say on their websites they don’t test on animals but their products are tested on animals when necessary by law. We think this an extreme contradiction and because of this, we think they parade themselves as conscientious companies who care about other living things, when we don’t think they are.
attributes.background: Make it a requirement for companies to state if their products are ever tested on animals anywhere in the world. We believe they need to set this out clearly, such as on their website.

departments.name: Department for Environment, Food and Rural Affairs
